name: Chicken Egg Game
description:
A platformer game where you don't always know who you are controlling!

Collect eggs with a cute chicken, but beware of fake clones that will confuse you.

Arrows to move
Spacebar to jump

Collect as many eggs as you can for the highscore.
Each time you have 10 seconds to collect an egg.

Fake chickens will appear from the collected eggs - they will copy your movements to confuse you.

Only the the TRUE CHICKEN collects eggs - don't lose yourself, good luck!

Music/Art/Code: Ilya Damyan
Made using: GODOT
